item.title: RE:ASSEMBLE
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
A Sweeping destruction is imminent. Retreating will lead to an end that is even worse than death. The heroes stand out under FATE’s guidance. | ROG

The post RE:ASSEMBLE first appeared on ROG SAGA.
item.content:encoded:

Retreating will lead to an end that is even worse than death.
The heroes stand out under FATE’s guidance. | ROG

item.title: For Those Who Dare
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
